roleset.name: not being there

roles.note: arg0 has been omitted because it is probably impossible in this construction (would probably need to be "absencing" to use it). Obviously, if you see one, send it in!

example.name: possessor arg2, with arg1
example.text: His reply conveyed his absence of mind.
example.note: Here, the possessor 'his' is actually the place lacking arg1, not any kind of agent. You can rephrase it (somewhat awkwardly) as 'his mind was absent from him'.

example.name: typical args 1 and 2
example.text: All the Democrats in the house could take a year - long vacation and the results would largely be the same , so Giffords 's absence from her duties is hardly consequential .

example.name: just arg1
example.text: His absence has been explained many times in many different ways , but he has virtually disappeared from the scene .
